question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to a street light behind a bus stop. What is your next move, given the target location for your next move?  
choose:  
A. I rise.  
B. I rotate the camera downward.  
C. I fly forward.  
D. I turn left.  
E. I turn right.  
F. I rotate the camera upward.  
G. I descend.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to a street light behind a bus stop, the agent needs to turn right from the current position, as the target location appears to be on the right side of the road in the given frames.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 2)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the initial position (0-2 seconds), the street light behind the bus stop appears to be on the right side of the road. Therefore, the next move should be to turn right.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: To navigate to a street light behind a bus stop, the agent needs to turn right from the current position, as the target location appears to be on the right side of the road in the given frames.
